mapper.select: SELECT reply_no, board_no, reply_text, replier, post_date, is_delete FROM reply WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY reply_no
SELECT reply_text FROM reply WHERE reply_no = #{replyNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (board_no, reply_text, replier) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{replyText}, #{replier})
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET reply_text = #{replyText } WHERE reply_no = #{replyNo}
mapper.delete: UPDATE reply SET is_delete = 'Y' WHERE reply_no = #{replyNo}
